price: У кунда дўстлар бир-бирига душмандир. Фақат тақводорлар бундан мустасно.
arabic: ٱلۡأَخِلَّآءُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-akhilāu yawma-idhin baʿḍuhum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun illā al-mutaqīna
